Author: alperC#7758
Content:
@everyone 

A friendly reminder that Komodo's mandatory Obsidian Dragon upgrade to the code base version 0.5.0 will happen at block height 1670000. That's about 57 hours from now. **This is a mandatory platform upgrade, so all miners, exchanges, and individuals running full-seed nodes must update to the latest software before block 1670000. Those who do not update will not run on the correct network.**

As a precaution, we have also advised all services and Exchanges to pause the deposits and withdrawals from Dec. 19th - 21st, 2019.

Wallets:
Komodo OceanQT: 
https://github.com/DeckerSU/KomodoOcean/releases/tag/v3.0.0-beta1-9979ca2

Komodod (core daemon): 
https://github.com/KomodoPlatform/komodo/releases/tag/0.5.0

Verus Agama: 
https://github.com/VerusCoin/Agama/releases/tag/v0.6.0-5

Find all the details about the Obsidian Dragon update here.
https://komodoplatform.com/komodo-to-activate-platform-wide-update/?utm_source=Komodo+Main+Newsletter&utm_campaign=5959f75965-EMAIL_CAMPAIGN_Newsletter_2019_Dec_13&utm_medium=email&utm_term=0_ed5b384f14-5959f75965-589687121
